title: Land for Sale: Affordable Plot in Dandora, Nairobi
text:
Looking for an entry-level investment or a strategic spot for building your future home? This residential plot in Dandora offers an accessible and affordable option within Nairobi‚Äôs urban core. Whether you‚Äôre buying for your own use or to grow your portfolio, Dandora is quickly gaining popularity due to its location and improving infrastructure.




Location: Dandora, Nairobi

Typology: Land

Size: 40x80 ft (approx. 1/10 Acre)

Title: Leasehold, ready for transfer

title: Welcome to KejaConnect
text:
Find Your Space. Settle with Ease
Welcome to KejaConnect ‚Äî your all-in-one platform for discovering real estate opportunities and trusted local service providers near you. Whether you‚Äôre buying land, renting a home, or managing a property, our interactive maps and smart tables help you find what you need ‚Äî from available plots to nearby plumbers, electricians, and more.
With KejaConnect, you‚Äôre not just moving in ‚Äî you‚Äôre plugging in.

title: Land for Sale: Prime Plot in Lang‚Äôata, Nairobi
text:
Looking to invest in Nairobi‚Äôs thriving real estate market? This prime plot in Lang‚Äôata offers a perfect opportunity‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre planning a family home, a gated community, or a mixed-use project. Located in one of Nairobi‚Äôs most accessible and fast-developing suburbs, this land is a smart buy for both developers and individual investors.




Location: Lang‚Äôata, Nairobi

Typology: Land

Size: 1/8 Acre (approx. 50x100 ft)

Title: Freehold, Ready for transfer

Status: For Sale

Price: KES 7,200,000

Secure and quiet area with growing demand
